name: Avoidance (Tony)
description:
A very simple 2D game that I made to get used to Godot 4.

INSTRUCTIONS: Avoid the creeps using either WASD or ARROW KEYS to move and either click 'Start' or press ENTER or SPACE to start the game!

PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS IN THE COMMENTS as fixing them will help me learn!

I will update it with mobile support in the future and add some stuff to spice it up but for now I guess just have fun and comment your high scores in the comments! (Don't lie/cheat though lol just cause I haven't added a highscore feature yet doesn't mean you can make up your high score lol, plus I'm just genuinely looking forward to seeing what scores people get if they play so be honest)

P.S: Whilst playtesting I got a score of 44 so that should give you something to try and beat if you try out the game :)

Oh and HUGE thanks to @MrPiedPiper#9666 on Discord for the help trying to add joystick/mobile support to the game!
